seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'Staff Data Engineer' and requires 5+ or 7+ years of experience depending on education level

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Staff Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on data pipelines and engineering

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions both batch tools (Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Airflow) and streaming tools (Kafka, Spark-Streaming)

leadership_expectation.evidence: Leading development independently, driving strategy and roadmap, coordinating with teams, and leading junior engineers without explicit people management duties

primary_cloud.evidence: Both AWS and Azure mentioned explicitly, no clear primary cloud provider

secondary_clouds.evidence: No additional clouds beyond AWS and Azure mentioned

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions both batch (Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Airflow) and streaming (Kafka, Spark-Streaming) processing

orchestrator_category.evidence: Airflow explicitly mentioned as a data pipeline and workflow management tool

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions both NoSQL databases and data lakes (Hadoop, Hive), along with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure) which may include warehouse solutions

remote_restriction.evidence: Hybrid position in Bengaluru East, Karnataka, India suggests regional restriction

timezone_focus.evidence: No timezone requirements explicitly or implicitly mentioned

relocation_required.evidence: Hybrid position implies local residency, no relocation package mentioned

h1b_friendly.evidence: No mention of H1B visa sponsorship in Pass 1 extraction

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No explicit mention of OPT/CPT or student visa support, location in India suggests local work authorization

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work authorization requirements mentioned for India

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type is full-time permanent but no explicit contract type (W2, C2C, 1099) mentioned

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits explicitly mentioned in Pass 1 extraction

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions leading and driving strategy, suggesting growth opportunities but no explicit career tracks

mentorship_signals.evidence: Proven experience working in a team of senior data engineers and leading a team of junior engineers suggests mentorship

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotion or advancement paths

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal mobility or role changes

career_tracks_available.evidence: Title and responsibilities align with individual contributor track at a staff level, no explicit mention of management or other tracks

requirement_strictness.evidence: Extensive list of must-have hard and soft skills with clear qualifiers like 'Proven experience' and 'Extensive experience'

scope_definition.evidence: Job description and responsibilities are well-defined and focused on data engineering tasks

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skill requirements align well with the staff seniority level and title
